text: I am in the process of build a POC for a marketing site that has content queried during render from our Elasticsearch DB. I see how a serverless function would solve this requirement for a client-side fetch, but really want to be able to do that fetch on the backend, ideally in the custom module with HubL. Is this possible at all? I know HubL can do asynchronous requests (with HubDB for example), but am afraid it doesn't look very flexible for anything custom.
